headline: Akamai Technologies (AKAM) Beats Stock Market Upswing: What Investors Need to Know
summary: Akamai Technologies (AKAM) reached $77.09 at the closing of the latest trading day, reflecting a +1.65% change compared to its last close.

headline: Akamai CEO Wins Emmy® Award
summary: Akamai Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ: AKAM), the cybersecurity and cloud computing company that powers and protects business online, today announced its co-founder and CEO, Dr. Tom Leighton, will receive a Technology & Engineering Emmy® Lifetime Achievement Award from the National Academy of Television Arts & Sciences (NATAS). The award recognizes Leighton for "pioneering the technologies that deliver compelling content to every device in our homes and pockets."

headline: Did Akamai’s (AKAM) New AI Bot Traffic Deals Just Shift Its Investment Narrative?
summary: In recent days, Akamai Technologies announced technical partnerships with TollBit and Skyfire to empower publishers and content owners to monetize AI bot traffic, alongside a strategic agreement with Seraphic Security to enhance Zero Trust security protections with secure enterprise browser capabilities. These collaborations signal Akamai’s pursuit of innovative solutions addressing both the growing complexity of AI-driven web traffic and heightened enterprise security requirements. To...
